subject: JUnit 4.0 status
msgSnippet: Anyone know the status of JUnit 4.0? I m interested in availability of code in support of the statement, Start architecting in the basics needed to allow
messageBody:
Anyone know the status of JUnit 4.0? I'm interested in availability of code
in support of the statement, "Start architecting in the basics needed to
allow others to support key features while still resting on-top of the
current source tree", mentioned in http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?JunitNextRelease.

I looked in SourceForge http://sourceforge.net/projects/junit/ and
http://sourceforge.net/forum/forum.php?forum_id=48542 and didn't see
anything mentioning ongoing development. Will JUnit 4.0 be one big release
or a series of small, incremental improvements as one would expect from an
XP project? I have my own ideas/needs for this and would be happy to make
whatever I do available but I don't want to recreate what already exists.

Thanks

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Mike Silverstein
SilverMark, Inc.
The object testing company
http://www.silvermark.com
